properties.displayName: UniFi Site Manager - Site Health Critical
properties.description: Detects when a site has multiple offline devices, indicating a significant site-level issue such as power outage, network failure, or infrastructure problem requiring immediate attention.
properties.query:
// UniFi Site Health Critical Detection
// Author: Fetch Labs (https://sentinel.blog)
let OfflineThreshold = 3;
UniFiSiteManager_Sites_CL
| where TimeGenerated > ago(30m)
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by siteId
| extend 
    siteName = tostring(meta.name),
    timezone = tostring(meta.timezone),
    totalDevices = toint(siteStatistics.counts.totalDevice),
    offlineDevices = toint(siteStatistics.counts.offlineDevice),
    wifiClients = toint(siteStatistics.counts.wifiClient),
    wiredClients = toint(siteStatistics.counts.wiredClient)
| where offlineDevices >= OfflineThreshold
| extend 
    AvailabilityPct = round(100.0 * (totalDevices - offlineDevices) / totalDevices, 1),
    TotalClients = wifiClients + wiredClients
| project
    TimeGenerated,
    SiteId = siteId,
    SiteName = siteName,
    TotalDevices = totalDevices,
    OfflineDevices = offlineDevices,
    OnlineDevices = totalDevices - offlineDevices,
    AvailabilityPct,
    TotalClients,
    WiFiClients = wifiClients,
    WiredClients = wiredClients,
    Timezone = timezone
